itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with sports agent Alex Guerrero to discuss his transition from playing in the NFL to becoming an agent, what players actually do when they get $100 million deals overnight, why the NCAA should be paying student at...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with sports agent Alex Guerrero to discuss his transition from playing in the NFL to becoming an agent, what players actually do when they get $100 million deals overnight, why the NCAA should be paying student athletes, and what happens when you don't make it and lose everything.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with sports agent Alex Guerrero to discuss his transition from playing in the NFL to becoming an agent, what players actually do when they get $100 million deals overnight, why the NCAA should be paying student athletes, and what happens when you don't make it and lose everything.

Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway sit down with sports agent Alex Guerrero to discuss his transition from playing in the NFL to becoming an agent, what players actually do when they get $100 million deals overnight, why the NCAA should be paying student athletes, and what happens when you don't make it and lose everything.
